headline: Greek Couscous Salad
name: Greek Couscous Salad
description: This Greek couscous salad with garbanzo beans, feta cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives is hearty and delicious. Perfect for a hot summer's day.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup canned garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Pour water and chicken broth into a saucepan; stir in the garlic and bring to a boil. Stir in pearl couscous, cover the pan, and remove from heat. Allow couscous to stand until water has been absorbed, about 5 minutes; fluff with a fork. Allow couscous to cool to warm temperature.
Lightly toss couscous, chickpeas, sun-dried tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese in a large serving bowl.
To make the dressing: Mix white wine vinegar, lemon juice, oregano, and black pepper in a small bowl until well combined. Pour over couscous mixture; toss again to serve.
